title: JMeter Load Test
description: This dashboard shows live load test metrics provided by JMeter.

list.label: Request
list.name: request
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "requestsRaw" WITH KEY = "requestName"

panels.content: The following panels show aggregated metrics for all requests

targets.query: SELECT  count("responseTime")/$aggregation FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[aggregation]]s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("startedThreads") FROM "virtualUsers" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[aggregation]]s) fill(null)
SELECT  count("responseTime")/$aggregation FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[aggregation]]s) fill(null)

SELECT count(responseTime) as Count, mean(responseTime) as Avg, min(responseTime) as Min, median(responseTime) as Median, percentile(responseTime, 90) as "90%",percentile(responseTime, 95) as "95%",percentile(responseTime, 99) as "99%", max(responseTime) as Max, (sum(errorCount)/count(responseTime)) as "Error Rate" FROM "requestsRaw"  WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY requestName

panels.content: The following panels show request-specific metrics for the request "[[request]]"

targets.query: SELECT count("responseTime")/$aggregation FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "requestName" =~ /^$request$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[aggregation]]s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("responseTime") FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "requestName" =~ /^$request$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[aggregation]]s) fill(null)
SELECT percentile("responseTime", 90) FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "requestName" =~ /^$request$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[aggregation]]s) fill(null)
SELECT percentile("responseTime", 95) FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "requestName" =~ /^$request$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[aggregation]]s) fill(null)
SELECT percentile("responseTime", 99) FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "requestName" =~ /^$request$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[aggregation]]s) fill(null)
SELECT max("responseTime") FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "requestName" =~ /^$request$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[aggregation]]s) fill(null)
SELECT sum("errorCount")/$aggregation FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "requestName" =~ /^$request$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[aggregation]]s) fill(null)
